    • apptErrorHandling

      protected void apptErrorHandling()
      Handles any errors in the appointment form by checking if all fields are filled in. Appends error messages to a StringBuilder if any fields are empty or incorrect. reused frm my Software I project.

    • displayErrors

    • setTimes

      protected void setTimes()
      Sets the start and end times of the appointment. Constructs a ZonedDateTime in UTC in the timeCollection method.

    • saveAppointmentButton

      private void saveAppointmentButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Saves the appointment to the database if there are no errors in the form. Initializes the appointment form and navigates back to the previous scene. Sets Appointment ID to 0 so database can create and auto increment. Checks for an overlapping appointment.
      Throws:
      IOException
